bibl.title: Aramaic, Hebrew and Greek Documentary Texts from Nahal Hever and Other Sites, with an Appendix Containing Alleged Qumran Texts (The Seiyâl Collection II).
bibl.note: Pp. 131-279: Greek Documentary Texts by H.M. COTTON. (Introduction to the Greek Documentary Texts; - Palaeographical Notes by J. David THOMAS; - Introduction to the Archive of Salome Komaïse Daughter of Levi, 125-131 CE; - Texts: P. XHev/Se 60-73). - Pp. 360-375: Indices to the Greek Documentary Texts; - 376-381: Subject Index to the Greek Documentary Texts.
bibl.seg: COTTON Hannah M. and Ada YARDENI (edited by), Aramaic, Hebrew and Greek Documentary Texts from Nahal Hever and Other Sites, with an Appendix Containing Alleged Qumran Texts (The Seiyâl Collection II). (Discoveries in the Judaean Desert. XXVII.)
Oxford, Clarendon Press, 1997, 4°, xxvii-381 pp., tabl. et 33 figg. + 61 pll. ISBN 0-19-826395-3. £95.

Pp. 131-279: Greek Documentary Texts by H.M. COTTON. (Introduction to the Greek Documentary Texts; - Palaeographical Notes by J. David THOMAS; - Introduction to the Archive of Salome Komaïse Daughter of Levi, 125-131 CE; - Texts: P. XHev/Se 60-73). - Pp. 360-375: Indices to the Greek Documentary Texts; - 376-381: Subject Index to the Greek Documentary Texts.

C.R. par Roger S. Bagnall, BASP 36 (1999) pp. 129-138. - Ranon Katzoff, SCI 19 (1999) pp. 316-327. - Johannes Kramer, ArchPF 44 (1998) pp. 312-314. - Robert P. Gordon, JThS N.S., 52 (2001) pp. 204-205. - G.W. Bowersock, JRA 14 (2001) pp. 657-660.
